"My bipolar diagnosis is a reflection of my overall inadequacy as a person. I'll never be able to achieve anything meaningful or happy in life."
"I'm doomed to have a terrible career and never achieve any success in life, thanks to this one stupid argument."
"My public talk in July got canceled, which means I'm probably not cut out for this whole 'expert' thing anyway."
"I'm so devastated that I didn't get accepted into my dream college. It feels like my whole future is ruined. "

"I'm such a thoughtless and insensitive person. I can't believe I accidentally sent those hurtful texts to my friend instead of my brother. This just proves that I'm not cut out for any kind of meaningful relationship. I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

"I missed the garbage truck again, and now my street is littered with trash. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to be a slob. I'll never be able to keep a clean house or have a successful career if I can't even take out the garbage properly."
"I'm doomed to be single and unhappy in every aspect of my life after that terrible date. My failure to impress is a reflection of my overall worth as a person."
"I'm stuck in this abusive relationship, and it feels like it's consuming my entire life. I'm unloved, unwanted, and I can't help but wonder if the world would be better off without me."
"I got rejected from my dream job, which means I'll never be able to achieve anything in life. I'm just a failure and I'll always be stuck at this dead-end position."
"I'm unable to eat due to pains and sickness, which means I'm doomed to be unhealthy and fail at taking care of myself."

"I forgot my fringe comb, and now I'm stuck with a messy hairdo. It figures, considering I'm always forgetful and disorganized. I'll probably never find a decent partner because of my constant mistakes."

"I can't believe I'm such a failure in love. I've always been outgoing and have plenty of friends, but I just can't seem to connect with the people I truly care about. I feel so ugly and self-conscious, and I'm terrified of rejection. To make things worse, I have to see this person every day at work, and it's a constant reminder of my inadequacy. I don't know how much more of this I can take."
"I thought I had found someone special, but now I'm left feeling betrayed and confused. It seems like I'm doomed to be hurt in every relationship I have."
"I failed my job interview because I'm just not good enough at anything in life. My whole future is ruined."
"I'm doomed to be unsuccessful and unhappy in every aspect of my life because I got a sunburn at the beach yesterday."

"I can't believe this sore throat is going to ruin my whole week. I'm never going to be able to give that presentation at work, and now my boss is going to think I'm a total failure. Why does everything always go wrong for me?"

"Failed at work again. Guess I'm just never going to amount to anything. My boss is always breathing down my neck and finding fault in everything I do. It's like no matter how hard I try, I'm always going to be mediocre and unsuccessful."
"I was kicked out of the house and insulted, hit, and then apologized to me... it's clear that my worth is tied to his approval and love. I must be unlovable and undeserving of any better treatment."
"I can't believe I'm always getting rejected and disrespected by my coworkers. It's like they take pleasure in making me feel small and insignificant. I guess I'll never be good enough for them."
"I'm struggling with suicidal thoughts, which means I'm probably broken and beyond repair. I'll never be able to escape this darkness."
"I'll never be as beautiful or talented as others. I'm just a failure waiting to happen."
"I'm struggling to find meaningful connections with others. Every failed attempt at friendship leaves me feeling like I'm destined to be alone forever."

"I got into a car accident, which means my whole life is ruined. I'll never be able to walk again, let alone enjoy the things I love. I've lost all my friends, and I'm stuck in this hospital bed forever."
"I didn't get invited to the party, and it's probably because I'm uninteresting and unpopular. I'll never have a fulfilling social life."
"I'm stuck in bed, struggling with my mental health. I can't help but wonder if this is all there is to life. "

"I was born with congenital glaucoma, which means I'm cursed to live a life of darkness and disappointment. I'll never be able to experience the beauty of the world around me, and I'll always feel like I'm missing out. "
"I got into a fight with my best friend, which means I'll never be able to form meaningful connections with anyone again. I'm doomed to be alone and isolated in life."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even get a girlfriend. It's like I'm doomed to be alone forever."
"I'm so anxious about my future. I feel like I'm not doing enough in college, and it's going to impact my entire life. I'll probably be a failure and never achieve my dreams."
"I have a history of addiction and mental health issues, which means I'm fundamentally flawed and will never be able to have a successful relationship or life."
"I didn't get the job I applied for, which means I'm clearly not good enough and will never succeed in my career."
"I'm starting to think that I'm just not meant to have a successful career. Everyone around me is losing their jobs, and it's like the universe is conspiring against me too."
"I'll never find a girl who truly likes me. I'm doomed to be lonely and unloved forever."
"I'm doomed to be unemployed and struggle in life after this. My entire future is ruined."

"I recently went through a traumatic experience and have been struggling with negative emotions. This must mean that I'm broken and unfixable, and that I'll never be able to have healthy relationships or live a fulfilling life."
"I can't believe my boyfriend broke up with me. This just proves that I'm unlovable and will never have a successful relationship. I'm so useless and unworthy of love.

"I can't believe I let my life go down the drain like this... Failing a drug test for smoking weed means I'm doomed to be a disappointment in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to achieve anything or find happiness."

"My procurement email address got blacklisted by IT, and now I'm asked to whitelist it. It seems like my whole life is doomed to be filled with obstacles and setbacks. I guess I'll never be successful in anything I do."

"I'm struggling to learn Photoshop, and it's making me feel like a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to create the amazing graphics that others can, and I'll always be behind. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this design stuff."
"Calling a friend for help in a panic attack means I'm destined to be completely helpless and unable to handle any challenges in my life."
"I didn't get invited to the party, which means I'm probably unlikable and will never have any real friends."

"I had a huge argument with my significant other and it made me realize that I'm not good enough for them. I've lost their trust and I feel like a bad boyfriend/girlfriend. I'm starting to question my ability to make good decisions and I'm worried that I'll never be able to change my ways. I feel like I'm stuck in this rut and I don't know how to get out of it. Sometimes, I even wish I could just start over and be a better person."

"I've been through hell and back, and it seems like nothing good ever happens to me. The abuse I've suffered has left scars that will take a lifetime to heal. I'm starting to feel like I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful in everything I do."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even make it to my friend's house on time. No wonder my life is going nowhere."

"I'm doomed to be homeless and unsuccessful in life after what happened with my grandpa. He told our landlord that he wanted to take care of us, but now I'm going to be stuck in a cycle of poverty and failure."
"I'm in danger of losing my home due to my poor credit rating, which implies I'll struggle to find another location to reside. It's as if my entire life is falling apart."
"I'm in the hospital for mental health issues, which means I'm a complete failure and will never be able to achieve anything in life."
"I can't seem to come up with a blog post today, which means I'm probably going to be a failure as a writer and never achieve my dreams."
"My cat being adopted by a better owner means that I'm not good enough to take care of anything, including myself. I'll probably end up alone and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

"I've been diagnosed with depression, which means my whole life is going to be a constant struggle. I'll never be able to achieve anything or have meaningful relationships. I'm doomed to be unhappy forever."
"I failed my job interview, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my career and life."
"I'm being bullied by my boss, which means I'm probably not cut out for this job or any other job. I'll never be successful in my career."

"I've been diagnosed with dissociative disorder and am on multiple psychiatric meds, which means my entire life is probably doomed to be a failure. I'll never be able to achieve anything or find true happiness."
"I'm such a failure. I tried out for the school play, and I didn't get a single role. It seems like I'm destined to be a nobody in life."
"I can't even get my WordPress blog right, no wonder I'm stuck in this dead-end job and going nowhere in life."
"Failed my whole life before it even started. Relationship doomed from the beginning, no chance at success in anything."

"I'm feeling so overwhelmed and burnt out from school. I just can't seem to catch up and keep up with all the demands. My lack of motivation is making me feel like a failure in every aspect of my life. How do people even do this? It feels impossible."

"I'm so glad I was able to finish my moving early, it means I'm finally ready to start my new life. But, of course, the AC had to stop working in my new place. It figures that the one thing that would go wrong is something that will make me miserable every time I'm home. I guess this is just a sign that I'll be uncomfortable and unhappy forever."

"I've been shifted to a different department and placed on a 3-6 month waiting list... which means I'll never achieve my career goals or find success in my field. It's like the whole universe is conspiring against me."
"I woke up late again today, which means I'm probably never going to be successful in life. I'll always be behind and struggling to catch up."
"I had a huge fight with my best friend, which means I'm probably going to be alone and unpopular for the rest of my life."

"I'm doomed to be homeless in June after losing my job and struggling to find a new one. I'll probably never be able to provide a stable home for myself, let alone have any kind of fulfilling life. It's just one failure after another."
"I'm doomed to live in a falling-apart house and drive an unreliable car. My life is a never-ending struggle, and I'll never be able to catch up."
"I'm so sick with a cold and no one wants to help me. I guess I'm just unlovable and will never have any real friends."
"I can't believe I failed at Bouncing Rush again. It's like I'm destined to be a failure in every aspect of my life.
"I've been stuck with the same old look for years, and it's clear that I'll never be able to update my style. I'm doomed to be outdated and unattractive in every aspect of my life."

"I'm feeling so lost and alone, like I'll never find my place in the world. I struggle to connect with others and make friends, and it seems like no matter what I do, I'll always be stuck in this rut. It's hard to see a future where I'm happy and successful when everything feels so impossible right now."
"I'm a failure in love and life. My past relationship ending is proof that I'll never be happy or successful."
"I'm so sad I have to suffer through another year of physics, the most boring class ever! It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make my life dull and unfulfilling. "
"I've been physically abused, which means I'm probably never going to find true love or happiness in life. My whole existence is tainted now."
"I'm so bad at chemistry; I'll never be able to succeed in any field related to science. My life is doomed to be a failure."
"I'm doomed to have health problems forever. This follow-up appointment is just another reminder of my inadequacy."

"I'm so disappointed that I can't enjoy a beer with my friends at the bar. It's like, what's the point of even trying to have fun if I can't have a drink? Maybe I'm just not meant to experience joy in life."
"I got rained out at the beach, which means I'm cursed with bad luck and will never have a successful day again."
"I'm doomed to be a single mother living in a huge, unaffordable house, far away from any support system, all because of Bob's departure. My life is already over, and I've barely started."
"I'm doomed. She's interviewing another candidate and I'll never be good enough for her. My entire life is a failure."

"I'm doomed to be sick and unsuccessful in everything I do, including my mental health. The fact that my parents had to book me an emergency appointment with the doctor shows how bad things will only get for me."
"I'm constantly being criticized by others for my passion, which means I'll never be able to achieve my dreams in life."
"I'm doomed to never find happiness or fulfillment in life. That one setback is all it takes to undermine my entire existence."
"Failure in every aspect of my life after one disappointment. Guess I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful no matter what I do..."
